description.raw:
I missed a few compiler warnings in pull request #196

There's still some in [MassMatrix3_TEST.cc](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-math/src/ign-math3/src/MassMatrix3_TEST.cc?fileviewer=file-view-default#MassMatrix3_TEST.cc-373), but I'm not sure how to fix that one without suppressing it.

~~~
src/MassMatrix3_TEST.cc: In function ‘void VerifyPrincipalMomentsAndAxes(const MassMatrix3d&, double)’:
src/MassMatrix3_TEST.cc:373:89: warning: comparing floating point with == or != is unsafe [-Wfloat-equal]
src/MassMatrix3_TEST.cc:373:105: warning: comparing floating point with == or != is unsafe [-Wfloat-equal]
src/MassMatrix3_TEST.cc:373:121: warning: comparing floating point with == or != is unsafe [-Wfloat-equal]
src/MassMatrix3_TEST.cc:373:137: warning: comparing floating point with == or != is unsafe [-Wfloat-equal]
~~~
